articles.description: Watch live, follow text commentary and radio coverage from Portugal v France in the Uefa Euro 2024 quarter-finals.
articles.title: Portugal v France LIVE: Euro 2024 team news, build-up & latest updates

articles.description: "No decision" has been made on the international futures of Cristiano Ronaldo and Pepe, says Portugal boss Roberto Martinez.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo future: 'No decision' made on striker or Pepe's Portugal future

articles.description: Spain hero Mikel Merino says their Euro 2024 quarter-final win over hosts Germany could have been a final - and coach Luis de la Fuente compares his team to a "winning horse".
articles.title: Spain 2-1 Germany: 'Like a Euros final' -  'insatiable' Spain like a 'winning horse'

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz keeps alive his hopes of retaining his Wimbledon title by coming through a five-set thriller against Frances Tiafoe.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz wins five-set thriller against Frances Tiafoe

articles.description: Manchester City and Manchester United are cleared to play in European competition after conflicts over multi-club ownership with Girona and Nice are resolved.
articles.title: Manchester City and Manchester United allowed into European competition after ownership issues

articles.description: England Gareth Southgate warns against an "entitlement we have as a nation that creates drama and annoys our opponents" before Saturday's Euro 2024 quarter-final with Switzerland.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Talk of easy draw shows 'entitlement', says England boss Gareth Southgate

articles.description: Belgium's Remco Evenepoel wins the time-trial on stage seven of the Tour de France, but Tadej Pogacar remains in the leader's overall yellow jersey.
articles.title: Tour de France: Remco Evenepoel wins time-trial as Pogacar stays in yellow

articles.description: Coco Gauff ends the run of British qualifier Sonay Kartal to reach the Wimbledon fourth round.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Coco Gauff beats Sonay Kartal to reach last 16

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says his team "look in a different place" mentally before their Euro 2024 quarter-final against Switzerland.
articles.title: England: Gareth Southgate says his team 'look in a different place mentally'

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris sets the pace in first practice at the British Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lando Norris sets pace in British Grand Prix first practice
